news.title: Amazon laying off about 16,000 corporate workers in latest anti-bureaucracy push
news.summary: The layoffs mark the second round of mass cuts at Amazon since last October. The company laid off roughly 14,000 employees across its corporate workforce.

news.title: Chip stocks rally after bumper earnings and a report of a game-changing China approval for Nvidia
news.summary: China has approved sales of Nvidia's H200, sending the AI chip giant's shares higher in premarket trade. Reuters reported that China has approved Sales of Nvidia’s H200.

news.title: Starbucks stock rises as coffee chain's traffic grows for the first time in two years
news.summary: Shares of Starbucks have fallen more than 3% over the last year. Starbucks shares are down more than 2% this year. The stock is up more than 1% in the last 12 months.

news.title: Southwest ends open seating after 54 years. Here's what the last flight was like
news.summary: Southwest Airlines replaced open seating with assigned seats after more than 50 years. Southwest Airlines replacedOpen seating with assignable seats for the first time in 1968. The airline has been changing its seating plans for more than half a century.

news.title: The Fed releases its latest interest rate decision Wednesday. Here's what to expect
news.summary: This week's meeting offers little suspense and probably not much action, even as massive changes loom over the Fed's longer-term direction.

news.title: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have a responsibility?
news.summary: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries,” her son says.

news.title: Deutsche Bank’s offices raided, reportedly over allegations tied to Roman Abramovich
news.summary: Germany’s federal criminal police office on Wednesday carried out a raid on the country's largest bank, Deutsche Bank. The raid was reportedly on money-laundering allegations tied to Russian magnate Roman Abramovich.

news.title: Starbucks rewards investors with another quarter of growth in a key sales metric
news.summary: Starbucks said growth in stores open at least 13 months was much better than expected. The stock was headed toward a 10-month high.

news.title: These stocks are the market’s new momentum plays as Big Tech loses steam
news.summary: A veteran money manager shares his top picks. Share your top picks with CNN iReport by sending us a picture of your best investment ideas. Send your best picks to: jennifer.smith@cnn.com.

news.title: Why this hedge-fund veteran says investors should own both high-flying gold and the sinking U.S. dollar
news.summary: Former head of commodities at Bridgewater says current dollar “freakout is overblown” Own dollar and gold,  he advises.
